Name: Pillow Simulator
About the game: Bored of sheep, flower and stone simulators? Do you want something really different? Meet the pillow simulator! What is the advantage of being a pillow: You can run away from home You can break vases You can attack people You can jump under the wheels of the car You can fly around the city in a jetpack You can participate in races You can buy skins for yourself (what, really?) You can become a pizza delivery man, or a thief running from the cops And many many others[/] And all this without looking up from your computer!
